forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle. Mostly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 5am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, the sun vies gently with fragments of cloud, creating a display that teeters on the edge of iconic beauty. The temperature, a mild embrace around 61 degrees, is tempered by a soft west-southwest breeze, whispering through the streets at a relaxed pace, just enough to carry away the remnants of any morning fog. The Golden Gate, shrouded in its trademark mystique, stands partly obscured but still proud against the cerulean backdrop, the marine layer lingering just out of reach, teasing those who seek the full view.

As the day unfolds, a slight chance of drizzle flirts with the evening sky, a mere reminder of the ocean's breath mingling with the warmth of the afternoon. Transitioning towards night, the atmosphere will turn cooler, settling into the embrace of a low near 56. In this poetic dance of nature, one might find joy in a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or a quiet refuge in a local café—sipping on a warm brew while gazing out at the dynamic scenery. Layers are advisable; a light jacket will shield against the coolness and subtle breezes, making for a comfortable exploration of this lively urban tapestry.
